title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Data Scientist to build predictive models using Python, scikit-learn, and SQL. Experience with feature engineering, model evaluation, and cloud platforms (AWS/Azure) is a plus.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Design, deploy, and maintain ML pipelines. Strong knowledge of TensorFlow or PyTorch, MLOps, Docker, and CI/CD. Familiarity with APIs and microservices.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Build scalable backend services in Node.js or Python (FastAPI). Knowledge of REST, databases (PostgreSQL), and caching (Redis). Experience in cloud (GCP/AWS) preferred.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze datasets, build dashboards, and present insights. Tools include SQL, Excel, Power BI/Tableau, and Python for basic analysis.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Work on NLP tasks including text classification, NER, and embeddings. Experience with spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers, and vector databases is desirable.
